text: Aluminium selenide, also known as aluminum selenide or aluminium(III) selenide, is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is Al2Se3. It contains aluminium in its +3 oxidation state. It contains aluminium and selenide ions. ==Properties== It reacts with water to make hydrogen selenide. It is a reducing agent and can burn to make aluminium oxide and selenium dioxide. ==Preparation== It is made by reacting selenium with aluminium powder at a high temperature. ==Uses== It is used to make hydrogen selenide. ==Related pages== *Sodium selenide ==References== Category:Selenium compounds Category:Aluminium compounds
title: Aluminium selenide
